subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Alan Voskuil scored a career-high 30 points and host Texas Tech beat No. 18 Kansas State, 84-75, on Wednesday night to give Pat Knight his first win since taking over for his father.
snippet: Alan Voskuil scored a career-high 30 points and host Texas Tech beat No. 18 Kansas State, 84-75, on Wednesday night to give Pat Knight his first win since taking over for his father.
